text.section: A Board of Directors shall manage the affairs of the authority and exercise all of the powers of the authority.

section.section: The term of a member of the Board appointed under subsection (b)(2) of this section is 4 years.
The terms of appointed members shall be staggered.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed.
